  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:s01.klascement.net:20020</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>KC</catalog>
            <entry>20020</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="nl">Tony Fraction's Pizza Shop</string>
          </title>
          <language>nl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Can you identify fractions of numbers, like 3 is 1/4 of 12? Sell as many pizzas as possible in five minutes by using fractions to apply toppings correctly. You need to have JavaScript enabled in your browser.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fractions of numbers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Travel well</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">universal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Travelwell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">eQNet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fractions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>4</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Können Sie Brüche von Zahlen, wie 3 kennzeichnen sind 1/4 
von 12? Verkaufen Sie bis zu Pizzas, wie möglich in fünf Minuten, 
indem Sie Brüche verwenden, um Spitzen richtig anzuwenden. Sie 
müssen das Javascript haben, das in Ihrer Datenbanksuchroutine 
aktiviert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Est-ce que pouvez-vous vous identifier des fractions des 
nombres, comme 3 a 1/4 ans de 12 ? Vendez autant de pizzas comme 
possibles en cinq minutes en employant des fractions pour appliquer 
des écrimages correctement. Vous devez avoir le Javascript permis 
dans votre navigateur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pode você identificar frações dos números, como 3 é 1/4 
de 12? Venda tantas como pizzas como possíveis em cinco minutos 
usando frações aplicar corretamente toppings. Você necessita ter o 
Javascript permitido em seu browser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Potete identificare le frazioni dei numeri, come 3 siete 1/4 
di 12? Vendi altretante pizze come possibili in cinque minuti usando 
le frazioni per applicare correttamente i guarnizioni. Dovete avere 
Javascript permesso in vostro browser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπορείτε να προσδιορίσετε τα μέρη των αριθμών, όπως 3 είναι 
1/4 12; Πωλήστε όσο το δυνατόν περισσότερες πίτσες σε 
πέντε λεπτά με τη χρησιμοποίηση των μερών για να εφαρμόσει τα 
καλύμματα σωστά. Πρέπει να επιτρέψετε JavaScript στον 
ξεφυλλιστή σας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Puede usted identificar fracciones de números, como 3 es 
1/4 de 12? Venda tantas pizzas como sea posible en cinco minutos 
usando fracciones para aplicar los toppings correctamente. Usted 
necesita tener Javascript permitido en su browser.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brüche von Zahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spielraumvertiefung</string>
